Text.val: 06.06.2010 GB SCR15539 Replacement calls the BMQ001 by the BMQ005
13.12.2007 AK SCR13197 added handling for HOFF_EMPDELCREDERE
18.07.2006 SH SCR11595 Changed selection (removed CLNT/CLHS tests)

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select dclc_admno, dclc_clntno, debc_debh, dclc_debc_no, debc_hoff_code_handling
FROM :1/dclc, :1/debc, :1/debb
WHERE dclc_datstartdelcredereinvst < ':2' and dclc_datdelcrederedecision is null and dclc_dateendlegalcoll is null and debb_actinvah > 0 and debb_debc_no = dclc_debc_no and debc_no = dclc_debc_no
for fetch only
